Message: This Is Your Emergency Broadcast System Announcing The Commencement Of The Second Purge , Sanctioned By The Chernarus Government.All crime including crime is legal for 48 consecutive hours until Sunday at 7pm EST. Purge Purge Purge Deez nuts!
Unattended cars will be deleted. Keep cars parked in garage when not in use.
The purge is active. Le Chernarus Government thanks you for your participation
